require 'quickfix_ruby'

class MyStringField < Quickfix::StringField
	def initialize( data = nil )
		if( data == nil )
			super(6123)
		else
			super(6123, data)
		end
	end
end

class MyDoubleField < Quickfix::DoubleField
	def initialize( data = nil )
		if( data == nil )
			super(8756)
		else
			super(8756, data)
		end
	end
end
